subject: Sports Injuries
Basketball
College Athletics
lead_paragraph: Seton Hall announced that Jeremy Hazell broke his left wrist during the Pirates’ 83-78 victory over Alabama on Friday night in the first round of the Paradise Jam tournament.
snippet: Seton Hall announced that Jeremy Hazell broke his left wrist during the Pirates’ 83-78 victory over Alabama on Friday night in the first round of the Paradise Jam tournament.
